attributes.action: Commission the statue of Rhiannon as Landmark Wales' choice for Dowlais, Merthyr
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Landmark Wales "competition" has no transparency in their final choices, general consensus outside of the LM team seems to suggest general public dislike of the chosen pieces. We the undersigned would like the proposed Rhiannon installation commissioned for Dowlais, Merthyr Tydfil. It is, we feel, both culturally and aesthetically the best choice for the site.
